name: MyYouTube - Dark
additional_info:
This is a bunch of codes put back together along the years with a few annoyances removed/hidden.(like all these "watch later" stuff that no one needs) (what we need from youtube is a "watch-subscription-as-playlist" function)


This style is mostly made to be used along "Resize YT To Window Size" (https://github.com/Zren/ResizeYoutubePlayerToWindowSize/) and "Iriduim" (https://github.com/ParticleCore/Iridium/wiki/Download) And also, most importantly, UblockOrigin (find this one on your own pls) ;)


You can ad your own background to enable transparency (switch the  -https://your-background-url.jpg- with you own)

edit:
..after some complaints, I went and ad a background as standard (https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2014/11/30/17/15/theater-551797_1280.jpg) I don't care. Those who knows their way around css won't mind and will replace it with the one of their choice anyway. I have more concern anyhow (like, how did they find a way to message me when they can't even switch an image in some codes -??!!??-. Anyway, you get all an upgrade of the style now) (this doesn't mean I'll do any next upgrade soon or ever though)
